type ClientChannelSinkStack = class interface IClientChannelSinkStack interface IClientResponseChannelSinkStack

summary.span: 持有异步消息响应解码过程中必须调用的客户端信道接收器堆栈。

span.span: Holds the stack of client channel sinks that must be invoked during an asynchronous message response decoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类，可以链接要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构权限，引发安全异常。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.

permission.span: 用于操作的基础结构代码。

span.span: For operating with infrastructure code.

summary.span: 请求对当前接收器堆栈中接收器的方法调用进行异步处理。

span.span: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks that are in the current sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化异步处理对当前接收器堆栈中的顶部接收器。The method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack. 有关附加信息，请参见 。For additional information, see .

span.span: The current sink stack is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DispatchException (Exception e);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DispatchException(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Public Sub DispatchException (e As Exception)
public: virtual void DispatchException(Exception ^ e);
abstract member DispatchException : Exception -> unit override this.DispatchException : Exception -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 要调度到服务器的异常。

span.span: The exception to dispatch to the server.

summary.span: 调度答复接收器上的指定异常。

span.span: Dispatches the specified exception on the reply sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将调度到通过对当前接收器堆栈的构造函数中指定的答复接收器服务器指定的异常。The method dispatches the specified exception to the server through the reply sink that is specified in the constructor of the current sink stack. 如果对当前接收器堆栈创建没有答复接收器的情况下，不传输异常，并会引发任何新的异常。If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the exception is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DispatchReplyMessage (System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage msg);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DispatchReplyMessage(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage msg) cil managed
Public Sub DispatchReplyMessage (msg As IMessage)
public: virtual void DispatchReplyMessage(System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMessage ^ msg);
abstract member DispatchReplyMessage : System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage -> unit override this.DispatchReplyMessage : System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage -> unit

span.span: The to dispatch.

summary.span: 调度答复接收器上的指定答复消息。

span.span: Dispatches the specified reply message on the reply sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指定将消息调度到的服务器通过对当前接收器堆栈的构造函数中指定的答复接收器。The method dispatches the specified message to the server through the reply sink that is specified in the constructor of the current sink stack. 如果对当前接收器堆栈创建没有答复接收器的情况下，不传输该消息，并会引发任何新的异常。If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the message is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.

param.name: sink
param.span: 要从接收器堆栈中移除和返回的接收器。

span.span: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.

summary.span: 弹出与接收器堆栈中指定接收器之下（含指定接收器）的所有接收器关联的信息。

span.span: Pops the information that is associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.

returns.span: 在请求端生成的、与指定接收器关联的信息。

span.span: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.

exception.span: 当前接收器堆栈为空，或者从未将指定接收器推送到当前堆栈中。

span.span: The current sink stack is empty, or the specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.

param.name: sink
param.span: 要推送到接收器堆栈中的接收器。

span.span: The sink to push onto the sink stack.

param.name: state
param.span: 在请求端生成的、响应端所需要的信息。

span.span: Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.

summary.span: 将指定的接收器和与之关联的信息推送到接收器堆栈中。

span.span: Pushes the specified sink and information that is associated with it onto the sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在请求端生成而中指定的信息`state`参数中返回`state`参数的相应接收器上的方法。The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the method on the corresponding sink.
